Literature.Title: Improving short antimicrobial peptides despite elusive rules for activity.
Literature.Author: Mikut R, Ruden S, Reischl M, Breitling F, Volkmer R, Hilpert K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa H103(MIC=32.6µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4.1µM),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=8.2µM),Candida albicans(MIC=16.3µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4.1µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16.3µM)
